序列化表格

  • 程序包 Demo

    • 类 Demo.ButtonList

      class ButtonList extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • answer
          JButton answer
          A JButton displaying the information of the true word.
        • letterList
          LetterList letterList
          A LetterList storing the input letters.
        • next
          JButton next
          A JButton getting a new random word from dictionary.txt and refreshing the window.

    • 类 Demo.KeyboardList

      class KeyboardList extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • keyboardList
          JLabel[][] keyboardList
          A two dimension arrays of JLabel[][] holding the virtual keyboard letters.
        • letterList
          LetterList letterList
          A LetterList storing the input letters.

    • 类 Demo.LetterList

      class LetterList extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • dictionary
          ArrayList<String> dictionary
          An ArrayList holding all 5-letters words in the dictionary.txt.
        • flag
          int flag
          A variable recording the type of the message window.

          The MessageFrame will display different messages for calling through MessageFrame.setMessage(). 

                    switch (flag) {
             case 0 -> setHintMessage();
             case 1 -> setInputErrorMessage();
             case 2 -> setAdvancePressMessage();
             case 3 -> setIllegalMessage();
             case 4 -> setGetWordMessage();
             case 5 -> setAnswerMessage();
         }
        • frame
          WordleFrame frame
          A WordleFrame storing the components of the game window.
        • keyboardList
          JLabel[][] keyboardList
          A two dimension arrays of JLabel[][] holding the virtual keyboard letters.
        • letters
          JLabel[][] letters
          A two dimension arrays of JLabel[][] holding the input letters.
        • messageFrame
          MessageFrame messageFrame
          A MessageButtons storing the messages.
        • repeat
          boolean[] repeat
          A boolean array holding state of repeat of input letters once.
        • result
          String result
          A String holding the input word once.
        • titleLabel
          TitleLabel titleLabel
          A TitleLabel storing the encouraging words
        • word
          String word
          A String holding the random word of a new game.
        • xLabel
          int xLabel
          A variable storing the index of input letters.
        • yLabel
          int yLabel
          A variable storing the times of input words.

    • 类 Demo.MessageFrame

      class MessageFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • flag
          int flag
          An int variable defining the type of messages.
        • letterList
          LetterList letterList
          A LetterList storing the input letters.
        • message
          JLabel message
          A JLabel storing the message of the states.
        • messageButtons
          MessageButtons messageButtons
          A MessageButtons storing the messages.
        • messageConfirm
          JButton messageConfirm
          A JButton storing the buttons.
        • messageIcon
          JLabel messageIcon
          A JLabel storing the icon of the types of state.
        • word
          String word
          A String storing the current word.

    • 类 Demo.TitleLabel

      class TitleLabel extends JLabel implements Serializable

    • 类 Demo.WordleFrame

      class WordleFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • 序列化字段

        • buttonList
          ButtonList buttonList
          A JPanel storing two ButtonList.
        • keyboardList
          KeyboardList keyboardList
          A KeyboardList storing the keyboard.
        • letterList
          LetterList letterList
          A LetterList storing the input letters.
        • messageButtons
          MessageButtons messageButtons
          A MessageButtons storing the messages.
        • titleLabel
          TitleLabel titleLabel
          A TitleLabel storing the encouraging words.
